notice.en: combine couse: PE2301A. Restrict to non-freshman who haven‘t taken this course before.
notice.ch: 不列入畢業學分，限修畢兩門大一體育及三門體育必修興趣選課四年級且未修過健身運動之學生，與課號PE2301A同班授課。選課異動期間，保留大四選修生每班2名，請至體育室教學組加簽(部分課程除外)。

remark.ch: 不列入畢業學分，限修畢兩門大一體育及三門體育必修興趣選課四年級且未修過健身運動之學生，與課號PE2301A同班授課。選課異動期間，保留大四選修生每班2名，請至體育室教學組加簽(部分課程除外)。
remark.en: combine couse: PE2301A. Restrict to non-freshman who haven‘t taken this course before.

goal.ch:
一、 鍛鍊身體，使體格與體能得以充分發展。
二、 激勵學生從事體能鍛鍊，培養正確終身運動習慣。
三、 加強肌力、心肺耐力，增強內臟機能，達到健身之目的。
goal.en:
1. Exercise your body to fully develop your physique and physical fitness.
2. Encourage students to engage in physical exercise and cultivate correct lifelong exercise habits.
3. Strengthen muscle strength, cardiopulmonary endurance, enhance visceral function, and achieve fitness goals.

outline.ch:
1.(1)上課進度及注意事項講解。(2)介紹健身運動之基礎概念。(3)各種訓練法簡介。
2. 健身運動基礎概念。
3. 體能檢測 (T字敏捷、伊利諾敏捷、單腳閉眼站立、20m)。
4. 上、下肢重量訓練器材操作說明與體驗 (機械式)。
5. 說明最大肌力檢測之方式，並實際檢測(四動作)。
6. 說明最大肌力檢測之方式，並實際檢測(四動作)。
7. 機械式器材循環訓練。
8. 槓鈴競技體適能動作教學。
9. 測驗 (重量訓練器材之動作正確性)。
10. 槓片訓練之概念與體驗。
11. 啞鈴訓練之概念與體驗。
12. 敏捷、協調訓練之教學與體驗 (以繩梯進行操作)。
13. 敏捷、協調訓練之教學與體驗 (結合繩梯、圓圈、角椎進行操作)。
14. 小欄架循環訓練體驗。
15. 體能檢測 (T字敏捷、伊利諾敏捷、單腳閉眼站立、20m)。
16. 學科考試。
17. 補考週。
18. 教師彈性教學。
outline.en:
1. (1) Explanation of class progress and precautions. (2)Introduce the basic concepts of fitness exercises. (3) Introduction to various training methods.
2. Basic concepts of fitness exercises.
3. Physical fitness test (T-shaped agility, Illinois agility, standing on one foot with eyes closed, 20m).
4. Upper and lower limb weight training equipment operation instructions and experience (mechanical type).
5. Explain the method of testing maximum muscle strength and actually test it (four movements).
6. Explain the method of testing maximum muscle strength and actually test it (four movements).
7. Mechanical equipment circuit training.
8. Barbell competitive fitness movement teaching.
9. Test (correctness of movement of weight training equipment).
10. Concept and experience of bar training.
11. Concept and experience of dumbbell training.
12. Teaching and experience of agility and coordination training (operating with rope ladder).
13. Teaching and experience of agility and coordination training (operating in conjunction with rope ladder, circles, and angle vertebrae).
14. Small hurdle circuit training experience.
15. Physical fitness test (T-shaped agility, Illinois agility, standing on one foot with eyes closed, 20m).
16. Subject examinations.
17. Make-up exam week.
18. Teachers provide flexible teaching.

textbook.ch: 肌力與體能訓練(增修版)
textbook.en: Essentials of Strength Training and Conditioning 4 Edition

instructMethod.ch:
講授

實習/實驗
個別指導

gradMethod.ch:
體育學科測驗：20％。
出席率及學習態度：20％。
術科測驗：60％。
gradMethod.en:
Physical Education Subject Test: 20％.
Attendance rate and learning attitude: 20％.
Technical test: 60％.

flexDiscription.ch:
17週為補考。
18週為教師彈性教學。
flexDiscription.en:
17 weeks is a make-up exam.
18 weeks for flexible teaching by teachers.
